entry.title: Toronto to Osaka / Kyoto, Japan - $565 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
Flights from Toronto to Osaka, Japan are available on United Airlines for a ridiculous $541 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

Some of the flights have an overnight layover in San Francisco.

Availability for travel

Late September, October, November, and December 2016

How to find and book this deal

1. Start with this Google Flights search...

Google Flights search: Toronto to Osaka, Japan

2. Click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view and try other dates.

Focus on the months listed above.

3. Click through from Google Flights to the United website

screenshot from United Airlines


Update 5/4 @ 2:30 PM EST - Some people are reporting that this deal is easier to book via Google Flights from a mobile device as opposed to a desktop or laptop computer.

entry.title: Toronto to Marrakech, Morocco - $617 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
British Airways has dropped the price of their flights from Toronto to Marrakech, Morocco down to $617 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

This is about 45% below the typical best prices for roundtrip flights between Toronto and Morocco.

However, most of the flights do have overnight layovers in London each way.

Availability for travel

November and December 2016
and
January and February 2017

How to find and book these flights

1. Go to Momondo.ca

2. Search for a flight from Toronto (YYZ) to Marrakech, Morocco (RAK)

3. Try one of the following date combinations:

Departure dates:

[2016]
Nov 1, 2, 7, 8, 9
Nov 14, 15, 16
Nov 21, 22, 23, 30

[2017]
Jan 9, 10, 11
Jan 16, 17, 18
Jan 23, 24, 25
Jan 30, 31
Feb 1, 6

Return dates:

[2016]
Nov 8, 15, 22
Dec 5, 12

[2017]
Jan 15, 16, 22, 23, 29, 30
Feb 14

4. Click through from Momondo.ca to whichever booking site is showing this price. Nanak Flights appears to be the cheapest at the moment.

screenshot from NanakFlights.com


Important: Watch out for the fact that you will need to transfer yourself fom London Heathrow to London Gatwick on the way there (and vice versa on the way back).

Make sure the layover time is a minimum of 6 hours to give yourself a comfortable amount of time to do this.

entry.title: Toronto to Europe in Premium Economy Class - From the mid $600s CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
The American Airlines website is showing a possible glitch involving codeshare flights with British Airways between Toronto and Europe.

The Premium Economy class flights are being priced the same as Economy class, which is unusual.

It's pretty common for the Premium Economy flights to run $1200-$1500 roundtrip or more. You can read more about flying Premium Economy with British Airways here.

Another interesting aspect is that dates around late December and over New Years may be available to certain destinations.

You can also upgrade from Premium Economy to Business Class for 12,500 AA miles each way.

Availability for travel

Late October 2016 to January 2017. Since it's the off-season, you may want to focus on Southern Europe (warmer).

How to find and book this deal

1. Start with one of these Google Flights searches...

Toronto to Naples, Italy - $651

Toronto to Madrid, Spain - $653

Toronto to Malaga, Spain - $670

Toronto to Venice, Italy - $689

Toronto to Turin, Italy - $689

Toronto to Pisa, Italy - $701

Toronto to Bologna, Italy - $703

Toronto to Zagreb, Croatia - $788

Toronto to Ibiza, Spain - $794

Toronto to Tenerife, Spain (Canary Islands) - $813

Toronto to London, UK - $826

Toronto to Palma (Mallorca), Spain - $849

Toronto to Granada, Spain - $850

Toronto to Prague, Czech Republic - $867

Toronto to Munich, Germany - $867

Toronto to Budapest, Hungary - $877

Toronto to Athens, Greece - $919

2. Click on the departure date box to open up the calendar view and try other dates.

3. Click through from Google Flights to the American Airlines website.

4. Click on 'Show Trip Details'


5. The key is to look for flights where the booking code is 'W' between Toronto and London (LHR). These are the Premium Economy flights.


As you book, you may want to take screenshots to prove that you paid for Premium Economy (W).

entry.title: Mistake fares: Toronto to Tel Aviv, Israel - from $370 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
Air Canada is showing some fares between Toronto and Tel Aviv, Israel that are so low, they are quite likely a mistake.

It's possible other destinations are a part of this mistake, so stay tuned on Twitter @YYZdeals for updates.

Update 4/28 @ 8:08 PM EST - It looks like the fares to Tel Aviv have been fixed.

How to find and book these flights

1. Start with a search like this one on Google Flights...

Google Flights search: Toronto to Tel Aviv, Israel

2. You'll notice that there's an extra flight, between Christchurch and Wellington, New Zealand. This flight is somewhat irrelevant, but necessary for the mistake price. You simply would not use the extra flight.

You can try experimenting with other dates to see what prices come up. I would start by focusing on Sunday to Wednesday to Wednesday flights like in the example above.

3. Select your flights, and then click through from Google Flights to Expedia for booking.

IMPORTANT: As this is likely a mistake fare, do *not* under any circumstances call the airline, and keep your expectations low. Air Canada has been known not to honor their mistake fares in the past. Expedia however, is generally pretty good for doing so. It's hard to say what will happen with this one.

If you find any other interesting prices, help out your fellow traveler and share the dates in the comments section below.

screenshot from Expedia.ca

Google Flights search: Toronto to Hong Kong

May 16, 17, or 18 to May 24 or June 6, 7, 8, or 13 - $531

entry.title: Toronto to Halifax, Nova Scotia - $259 CAD roundtrip including taxes | summer travel
entry.content:
WestJet is showing some significant price drops on their flights from Toronto to Halifax, Nova Scotia - dropping them down to $273 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

This is about 33% below the typical best prices between Toronto and Halifax.

What's even more interesting is that July dates are a part of this drop. WestJet and Air Canada do not typically like to drop their prices for summer domestic travel.

Availability for travel

mid to late-May, June, and July 2016. August 3rd is the latest you can come back.

How to find and book these flights

1. Go to FlightNetwork

2. Search for a flight from Toronto (YYZ) to Halifax (YHZ)

Start by searching for any dates in late May, June or July 2016.

Once the search completes, have a look at the 'Alternate Date Options' box near the top.


In this box, look for dates that cost around $134 CAD on the way there, and $135 CAD on the way back.

Tuesday and Wednesday dates are the most common.

3. Try searching on Flight Network again, using the dates you found above.

4. You can bring the price down another $10 CAD once you get to Flight Network by using the promo code: 3P10OFF321

You'll find the spot to enter the promo code on the passenger details page (after you've selected the flight). It can be difficult to find.

Here's a screenshot of where to enter it: (look near the bottom)
http://s17.postimg.org/ee0f9z4v3/Clipboard01.jpg

screenshot from FlightNetwork.com (before the $10 promo code is applied)


Flight Network is ranked #6 in the Third Party Booking Site Power Rankings.

entry.title: Toronto to St. John's, Newfoundland - $291 CAD roundtrip including taxes | early summer travel
entry.content:
Sunwing is showing a few flights for early summer travel from Toronto to St. John's, Newfoundland for $291 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

This is about 33% below the typical best prices.

Availability for travel

June 2016

How to find and book these flights

1. Go to one of the following booking sites:

Sunwing's website - $302 CAD roundtrip including taxes

FlightNetwork.com - $291 CAD roundtrip including taxes (after promo code)

2. Search for a flight from Toronto (YYZ) to St. John's, Newfoundland

Try one of the following dates:

Departure dates:

June 15, 16, or 17

Return dates:

June 16, 20 or 23

screenshot from FlightNetwork.com


Flight Network promo code

You can bring the price down another $10 CAD once you get to Flight Network by using the promo code: 3P10OFF321

You'll find the spot to enter the promo code on the passenger details page (after you've selected the flight). It can be difficult to find.

Here's a screenshot of where to enter it: (look near the bottom)
http://s17.postimg.org/ee0f9z4v3/Clipboard01.jpg

entry.title: Toronto to Lima, Peru - $578 CAD roundtrip including taxes | May and June 2016
entry.content:
AeroMexico has dropped the price of their flights from Toronto to Lima, Peru down to $578 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

The flights have an overnight layover in Mexico City on the way back.

Availability for travel

April, May and June 2016

How to find and book this deal

1. Go to Expedia.ca

2. Search for a flight from Toronto (YYZ) to Lima, Peru (LIM)

3. Try one of the following date combinations:

departure dates:

April 14, 15, 16, 17, 18
April 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25
April 26, 27, 28, 29, 30
May 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9
May 10, 11, 12
May 23, 24, 25, 26, 27
June 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 13, 14
June 21, 22, 23, 27

return dates:

Apr 20, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25
May 1, 5, 6, 10
May 12, 13, 17
May 18, 19, 24
May 26, 28, 29, 31

June 15, 16, 21
June 22, 23, 25, 26, 28

NOTE: Some departure dates may have a long layover. You may want to try a day before, or after, to look for the flights that have the more reasonable 4 hour layover.

You're looking for the departure dates that show a 14h 38m total travel time on the way there.

entry.title: Toronto to Saint Martin, South Caribbean Island - $298 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
Air Canada Rouge is selling off some last minute seats to Saint Martin, the beautiful island in the south Caribbean, for $298 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

Here's how to find this deal...

1. Go to the Air Canada Vacations website (you won't see them on AirCanada.com because they are Air Canada charter flights)

2. Click on the 'Flights' tab under Vacation Search
^^ very important, a lot of people miss this, and think they can't find the deal.

3. Search for a flight from Toronto (YYZ) to St. Maarten, Princess Juliana Int'l (SXM)

Use one of the following date combinations:

-=[ 2016 ]=-
Jan 9 to 16
Jan 16 to 23 -- $315 now
Jan 23 to 30 -- sold out
Jan 30 to Feb 6 -- sold out
Feb 4 to Feb 11
Feb 6 to Feb 13
Feb 9 to Feb 16
Feb 20 to Feb 27
Feb 27 to Mar 5
Mar 5 to Mar 12
Apr 17 to Apr 24 -- new!

screenshot from AirCanadaVacations.com:


Where to stay on St. Martin ?

The following AirBNB links will lead you to some great deals on places to stay on St. Martin for under $119 CAD/night for 2 people.

AirBNB on St. Martin - 183 listings for under $119 CAD/night

You could also try VRBO, which is showing around 18 properties for under $100 USD/night. Just run a search for St. Martin when you get there. After you hit Search you can apply the price filter.

entry.title: 2 in 1 trip: Toronto to Hong Kong AND Tokyo, Japan - $748 CAD roundtrip including taxes
entry.content:
A multi-city flight deal that allows you to visit both Hong Kong and Tokyo, Japan (spending time in both destinations) from Toronto, for just $748 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

It's also currently possible to find roundtrip fares from Toronto to just Hong Kong alone for $648 CAD roundtrip including taxes.

Toronto to Tokyo, Japan on it's own is around $1076 CAD.

Availability for travel

early to mid May, and September to December 2016

How to find and book this deal

1. Go to FlightHub

2. Click on 'Multiple City'

3. Search for the following:

Toronto (YYZ) to Hong Kong (HKG)
Hong Kong (HKG) to Tokyo, Japan (TYO)
Tokyo, Japan (TYO) to Toronto (YYZ)

As for the dates to use, try one of the following examples that allows you to visit each destination for a week:

(note: you can also experiment with shorter or longer stays at each destination. You may want to focus on Tue and Wed flights for the best chance of keeping the price low. Mixing and matching using the dates below is a good way to start.)

May 4 to 10 to 17
Sep 27 to Oct 4 to 11
Oct 19 to 25 to Nov 1
Oct 25 to Nov 1 to Nov 8
Nov 1 to 8 to 15
Nov 8 to 15 to 22
Nov 22 to 29 to Dec 6
Nov 29 to Dec 6 to 13

screenshot from FlightHub


Toronto to Hong Kong on it's own - $648 CAD roundtrip including taxes

1. Go to FlightHub

2. Search for a roundtrip flight, from Toronto (YYZ) to Hong Kong (HKG)

3. Choose dates from the list above.
